title: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Learn the core technologies that power the web: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build your first responsive website from scratch.

title: Data Science Essentials
description: Master the fundamentals of data analysis, visualization, and machine learning. Work with real-world datasets to solve complex problems.

title: UX Design Principles
description: Learn the principles of user-centered design. Create intuitive interfaces that delight users and solve real problems.

title: Advanced JavaScript Concepts
description: Take your JavaScript skills to the next level. Learn advanced patterns, asynchronous programming, and modern ES6+ features.

title: Responsive Web Design
description: Master the art of creating websites that look and function beautifully on any device. Learn modern CSS techniques and best practices.

title: Business Analytics Fundamentals
description: Learn how to analyze business data to drive decision making. Master essential tools and techniques for business intelligence.
